Posts.EditableText: I've created my first screencast, giving a quick introduction to getting started with Quest: http://youtu.be/7vIi0U4rSX4 Would appreciate any feedback. I think I should probably do it in a smaller window next time, so the text appears larger (I suggest switching to HD and going full-screen for viewing). Any other thoughts? I may create some screencasts on particular topics if there is enough demand. Anything you'd like me to demo in this way?
Posts.HTML:
I've created my first screencast, giving a quick introduction to getting started with Quest: http://youtu.be/7vIi0U4rSX4

Would appreciate any feedback. I think I should probably do it in a smaller window next time, so the text appears larger (I suggest switching to HD and going full-screen for viewing). Any other thoughts?

I may create some screencasts on particular topics if there is enough demand. Anything you'd like me to demo in this way?

Posts.EditableText: I thought it looked very good.
Posts.HTML: I thought it looked very good.

Posts.EditableText: I want to see a facecam
